message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a rare and valuable product. I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $825000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $800000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
